Title: Wrong error message for invalid username
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open login page
2. Enter invalid username: incorrectUser
3. Enter valid password: Password123
4. Click Submit

Title: Typo in error message for invalid password
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open login page
2. Enter valid username: student
3. Enter invalid password: incorrectPassword
4. Click Submit

Title: Wrong error message for different case username
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open login page
2. Enter username in different case (e.g. STUDENT)
3. Enter valid password: password
4. Click Submit
Expected Result: If case insensitive: login success. If case sensitive: error should say 'Your username is invalid!'
